mapper.select: SELECT user_id as "userId", user_name as "userName", user_address as "userAddress", user_phone as "userPhone" FROM users WHERE user_id = #{userId}

SELECT p.product_id as "productId", p.product_name as "productName", p.product_price as "productPrice", p.product_description as "description", pi.image_id as "imageId", pi.image_name as "imageName", pi.image_size as "imageSize", pi.image_type as "imageType", pi.image_data as "imageData" FROM product P JOIN product_image pi ON p.product_id = pi.product_id WHERE p.product_id = #{productId}
SELECT LAST_NUMBER-1 AS PurchaseId FROM user_sequences WHERE sequence_name = 'PURCHASE_SEQ'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PURCHASE (purchase_id, user_id, delivery, purchase_date, purchase_state, total_price) VALUES (PURCHASE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{delivery}, to_date(sysdate,'YY/MM/DD'), '배송전', #{totalPrice})
INSERT INTO PURCHASE_DETAIL (purchase_detail_id, product_id, purchase_id, purchase_cnt) VALUES (PURCHASE_DETAIL_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{productId}, #{purchaseId}, #{purchaseCnt})
mapper.select: SELECT purchase_id as "purchaseId", purchase_date as "PurchaseDate", delivery as "delivery", purchase_state as "purchaseState", total_price as "totalPrice" FROM purchase WHERE user_id=#{userId} ORDER BY purchase_id DESC

SELECT p.purchase_id as "purchaseId", p.purchase_date as "purchaseDate", p.purchase_state as "purchaseState", p.total_price as "totalPrice", p.user_id as "userId", p.delivery as "delivery", u.user_phone as "userPhone", u.user_name as "userName", u.user_phone as "userPhone" FROM purchase p JOIN users u ON u.user_id=p.user_id where p.purchase_id=#{productId}

SELECT pi.image_id as "imageId", p.product_name as "productName", pd.purchase_cnt as "purchaseCnt", p.product_price as "productPrice" FROM purchase_detail pd JOIN product p ON pd.product_id=p.product_id JOIN product_image pi ON pd.product_id=pi.product_id WHERE pd.purchase_id=#{purchase_id}

SELECT pp.product_name AS productName, pp.product_price AS productPrice, pp.category_id AS categoryId, pp.product_id AS productId, pi.image_id AS imageId, pi.image_name AS imageName, pi.image_size AS imageSize, pi.image_type AS imageType, pi.image_data AS imageData FROM (SELECT product_name, product_price, category_id, product_id, ssum, rownum as rnum FROM (SELECT p.product_name, p.product_price, p.category_id, pd.product_id, sum(pd.purchase_cnt) as ssum from purchase_detail pd LEFT JOIN product p on pd.product_id = p.product_id GROUP BY pd.product_id, p.product_name, p.product_price, p.category_id order by ssum desc ) ) pp LEFT JOIN product_image pi on pp.product_id = pi.product_id WHERE rnum <= 3
